articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Strategic Ballistic Rocket Launching Drill of KPA Strategic Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Strategic Ballistic Rocket Launching Drill of KPA Strategic Force
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, guided an intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket launching drill of the KPA Strategic Force on the spot.
					 The drill was observed by senior officials of the Central Committee of the WPK including Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik, Jo Yong Won and Yu Jin, and officials in the field of defence scientific research including Jang Chang Ha and Jon Il Ho.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was greeted by commanding officers of the KPA Strategic Force including its General Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the KPA Strategic Force.
					
					 Involved in the drill were Hwasong artillery units of the KPA Strategic Force tasked with striking the bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces located in the Pacific operational theater in contingency and intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12.
					
					 As known to the world, the intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket launching drill of the KPA Strategic Force was conducted as a part of the muscle-flexing to counter the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces finally kicked off in disregard of the DPRK's meaningful and crucial warning.
					
					 The drill was carried out through the combination of sudden maneuvers and strike in order to estimate and examine the posture of the KPA Strategic Force for prompt counteraction in contingency on the Korean peninsula and to confirm the actual war operation capacity of the intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket newly equipped with by it.
					
					 The Hwasong artillery personnel, who were to conduct the launching drill for the first time in the capital city of the DPRK by order of Kim Jong Un, were all filled with strong militant enthusiasm.
					
					 Kim Jong Un arrived at the launching ground early at dawn and watched the artillerymen promptly moving and deploying the Hwasong-12 rocket launcher, praising them for their smart and accurate movement.
					
					 He learned in detail about the launch plan, preset flight track and target waters and issued an order to launch the rocket.
					
					 The fired ballistic rocket reflecting the dignity and might of the Juche-based nuclear power crossed the sky above Oshima peninsula of Hokkaido and Cape Erimo of Japan along the preset flight track and accurately hit the preset target waters in northern Pacific.
					
					 The drill had no impact on the security of the neighboring countries.
					
					 In the drill the rocket operational capacity of the Hwasong artillery units of the KPA Strategic Force for an actual war and the combat efficiency of the newly equipped intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket were all proved perfect.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the successful launching.
					
					 Praising the Hwasong artillerymen of the Strategic Force for being well versed in the newly equipped ultra-modern rocket system and properly operating it, he said the drill would offer them an opportunity for gaining a good experience in their rocket operation for an actual war. 
					
					 Noting that the current ballistic rocket launching drill like a real war is the first step of the military operation of the KPA in the Pacific and a meaningful prelude to containing Guam, advanced base of invasion, he said that it is necessary to positively push forward the work for putting the strategic force on a modern basis by conducting more ballistic rocket launching drills with the Pacific as a target in the future.
					
					 Sternly saying that the U.S. answered the DPRK's warning which it will closely watch the U.S. behavior with the bellicose war exercises for aggression, he added that the drill conducted by the Strategic Force is a curtain-raiser of its resolute countermeasures against the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being conducted by the U.S. and its stooges.
					
					 Noting that it is a lesson drew by the DPRK this time again that it should show action, not talk, to the U.S. imprudently denying the DPRK's initiative measure for easing the extreme tension, he stressed that the DPRK will continue to watch the U.S. demeanors as already declared and decide its future action according to them.
					
					 He expressed great belief and conviction that the officers and men of the Strategic Force will further strengthen the combat preparations of Hwasong artillery pieces as required by the grim situation, be fully ready to go into action for decisive battle so as to launch powerful ballistic rockets anytime and thus check military racket of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and firmly guarantee the security of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 Officers and men of the KPA Strategic Force extended the warmest thanks to Kim Jong Un, peerless patriot and hero of the nation, who gave vent to the long-pent grudge of the Korean people by mapping out a bold plan to make the cruel Japanese islanders insensible on bloody Aug. 29 when the disgraceful "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" was proclaimed 107 years ago and approving ballistic rocket launching in the capital region, and pledged that once the Party Central Committee issues an order, they will fulfill their sacred mission and duty as the reliable nuclear force of the WPK in the van of the final sacred war which will win victory in the standoff with imperialism and the U.S.

articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Gabon
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Gabon
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Emmanuel Issoze Ngondet upon his re-appointment as prime minister of Gabon.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the mutual interests of the government and people of the two countries and wished the prime minister success in his responsible work.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Noel Nelson Messone upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation, Francophone, Regional Integration and Overseas Compatriots of Gabon, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and Overseas Compatriots of Congo
articles.content:
Congratulations to Minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and Overseas Compatriots of Congo
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Gakosso Jean Claude upon his stay in office as minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and Overseas Compatriots of Congo.
					 The message expressed belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the minister success in his work.

articles.title: First Secretary of Youth League Meets DR Congo Delegation
articles.content:
First Secretary of Youth League Meets DR Congo Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, had a talk with a delegation of the Federation of Students and Pupils of DR Congo led by National Chairman Mpongo Ne Kongo, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Federation of Students and Pupils of DR Congo
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Federation of Students and Pupils of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Federation of Students and Pupils of DR Congo.
					 The gift was conveyed on Wednesday to an official concerned by Mpongo Ne Kongo, national chairman of the federation who is heading a delegation of the federation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation Related to Development of Korean-Style Underground Electric Car Held
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation Related to Development of Korean-Style Underground Electric Car Held
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- A sci-tech presentation related to the development of the Korean-style underground electric car was held at the IT Institute of the Ministry of Railways on Aug. 29 and 30 under the sponsorship of the C.C., the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were teachers, researchers, technicians and graduate students in the field, of scientific education and railway transport including Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang University of Railways, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Railway Institute of the Ministry of Railways and the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex.
					
					 It was divided into electric and IT panels and machine panels. It heard papers on the successes made in design, manufacture and operation of underground electric car and more than 80 valuable papers on solving scientific and technological issues based on them. 
					
					 There took place a lecture on the trend of the development of the underground flatcar and the system of controlling traction.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation in City Management Field Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation in City Management Field Held 
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of city management was held at the Sci-tech Complex on August 29 and 30.
					 The presentation sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea brought together scientists, researchers, technicians and officials of many units including Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang University of Architecture, the City Management Scientific Research Institute, the Turf Branch Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and Pyongyang City Water Supply and Sewage Management Bureau.
					
					 Presented to the presentation were more than 170 papers conducive to contributing to effecting a fresh turn in city management this year.
					
					 Introduced were papers which made deep-going scientific and theoretical description of issues arising in improving the management of buildings and facilities to which green architecture technologies are introduced.
					
					 Also presented were research attainments which solved scientific and technical issues arising in city management including the cooling and heating system of buildings, sewage treatment.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at 29th Summer Universiad
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at 29th Summer Universiad
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK players bagged 23 medals at the 29th Summer Universiad including 12 gold medals. In 2003, they won 13 medals.
					 In particular, weightlifters grabbed 7 gold medals.
					
					 Kim Kuk Hyang secured the first place at the women's 10 meter platform diving, the 10 meter synchro platform diving and the 10 meters mixed synchro platform diving and Ri Hyon Ju finished first at the men's 10 meter platform diving.
					
					 The news delighted the people.
					
					 Ri Yong Hui, mother of Rim Jong Sim and Rim Un Sim who snatched gold medals at the 75 kg and 63 kg categories of women's weightlifting event, in an interview with KCNA, said that she is proud of having good daughters and expressed her heartfelt thanks to the motherland.
					
					 Mun Kang Sun, a weaver of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill who carried out the work equivalent to her three year's assignments, said that the news is encouraging the workers of the mill to an increased production. She noted that she would frustrate the heinous sanctions and pressure of the U.S. imperialists and their hostile forces and continue to take the lead in the drive for improving the people's living standard under the uplifted banner of self-reliance.

articles.title: Exhibition of Youth Scientific and Technological Successes
articles.content:
Exhibition of Youth Scientific and Technological Successes 
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Recently, an exhibition of youth scientific and technological successes took place at the Sci-tech Complex in the DPRK to mark the 90th anniversary of the Young Communist League of Korea.
					 On display there were more than 4,100 valuable inventions and new technological innovations, including 550-odd pieces of advanced sci-tech achievements. The exhibition demonstrated high creative spirit and ardent patriotism of the Korean youth to discharge their mission as the pioneer for building a sci-tech power.
					
					 Young scientists of the State Academy of Sciences presented 3-D underground information system for putting coal production on a modern, scientific and IT basis.
					
					 Drawing the attention of the visitors were the system for automatically distinguishing rolling stock and 4-D simulation film editing system and screening system presented by research institutions.
					
					 The Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade Guidance Bureau exhibited more than 60 research achievements, thus showing the truth that there is nothing impossible when one depends on its own strength.
					
					 The three-revolution team members across the country put on display sci-tech achievements conducive to boosting the production in industrial establishments, including the polychrome technology of cotton towel and a soap moisture measuring instrument.
					
					 All the achievements clearly prove the validity of the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of prioritizing science and technology, encouraging the young Korean people stepping up the youth science and technology campaign.

articles.title: Delegation of Union of Korean Students in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Union of Korean Students in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Korean Students in Japan led by Ri Hong Yun, vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation looked round historic relics at the old home, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of the President and patriotic careers of his family members.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Youth Movement Museum, the Revolutionary Museum and E-Library at Kim Il Sung University, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, etc.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Derides S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Action
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Derides S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Action 
Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces dumbfounded by the DPRK's toughest offensive against the U.S. is going about foolish, like those unaware of their impending death.
					 The south Korean chief executive who claim "there should not be a war" under the signboard of "peace" finally started Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with the U.S., pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the point of explosion.
					
					 Talking about "suspension of someone's provocation" while describing the north-targeted war drills in which huge aggression forces are involved as "annual and defensive drills" is utterly illogical and reminds one of a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 As known, the nuclear force of the DPRK is a treasured sword for defending the sovereignty and the right to existence of the Korean nation from the aggression and interference by outsiders, and it represents the most reliable war deterrence.
					
					 The present situation reminds one of the eve of the Korean war in the 1950s.
					
					 The boss of the empire of evil went so impudent as to say that even though a war breaks out, it will be on the Korean peninsula and even though thousands die, that will be on the peninsula as he views the Korean nation as victims of the scenario for world domination.
					
					 War servants of the U.S. flew into south Korea one after another to hold war confabs and toured DPRK-targeted war drills, calling for "getting ready to be able to fight anytime". This is an already disclosed fact.
					
					 The recent saber-rattling is never a military game of children as it involves huge troops of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the puppet forces, lethal weapons, administrative organizations in Seoul and provinces of south Korea, huge labor and material resources of the munitions and civilian institutions, and also forces of seven satellite countries.
					
					 The U.S., a war state, and its stooges are professing "guardian of peace" and clamoring for "security crisis" even though they kick up heinous war frenzy in this bright world.
					
					 It is the invariable stand and mode of thorough counteraction of the DPRK to foil the U.S. reckless "preventive war" and "preemptive attack" with Korean-style just all-out war and earlier preemptive attack.
					
					 The DPRK does not make an empty talk.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better have a look at their foolish and silly master spending each miserable and painful second and moment of its life in the world eyes.
					
					 Those steeped in sycophancy toward the U.S. are bound to become foolish enough to take a knife-brandishing robber storming one's own house as "protector".
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better judge whether they can be responsible for the future happenings before going rash.

articles.title: Military Hysteria of Sworn Enemies of Korea Will Invite Self-destruction: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Military Hysteria of Sworn Enemies of Korea Will Invite Self-destruction: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is going busy, in alignment with Japan.
					 At a U.S.-Japan security consultative committee meeting in Washington they issued a "joint statement" the keynote of which is the provision of the extended deterrence of the U.S. to Japan and the cooperation in military pressure on the DPRK pursuant to Japan's expansion of defence capabilities.
					
					 In Japan the chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff was closeted with the chairman of the Joint Staff Council of Japan' "Self-Defense Forces" over the issue of the deployment of the U.S. Aegis missile defence system in Japan.
					
					 Washington and Tokyo show increased military collusion as evidenced by actual actions like joint military exercises by the U.S. marines and the Japan ground SDF and the joint air exercises simulating the emergency on the Korean peninsula by the U.S. air SDF and the U.S. air force in Hokkaido.
					
					 This shows the collusion of the sworn enemies of the DPRK aimed to realize without fail the ambition for the invasion of the DPRK, and a dangerous military action to push the tense situation in the peninsula and the region to the touch-and-go war phase.
					
					 Recently the U.S. and Japan have put spurs to increasing military expenditure and bolstering military capabilities, and all kinds of their strategic assets have been assembled on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S.-Japan nexus under the pretext of "the nuclear and missile threats from the DPRK" reminds one of the days early in the last century when the brigandish "Katsura-Taft agreement" was fabricated and fierce moves were taken for the invasion of Korea.
					
					 What remains unchanged despite the change of the times and replacement of generations is the U.S. and Japan's deep-rooted ambition for invasion of Korea.
					
					 The reason that they are tightening military nexus is to hold junior "ally" under tighter control and use it as a shock brigade in executing the strategy toward Asia and in realizing the strategy for dominating the world.
					
					 Crafty Japan is seeking to attain its strategic goal with the help of the U.S.
					
					 Taking the increased tension on the Korean peninsula as a "good opportunity" for realizing the constitutional revision and the ambition for emerging a military giant, Japan has now come out with its sleeves rolled up in supporting its master's anti-DPRK war moves while vociferating about the "threat from the north".
					
					 Their military nexus has become a serious threat to peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Tragic is that they are still unaware of the fact that such an act is little short of stepping deeper into the optical sight of the DPRK and accelerating self-destruction.
					
					 They should not be forgotten that the DPRK's toughest countermeasures include a warning to Japan going wild, being unaware of its imminent destruction, not just to the U.S. seriously threatening the sovereignty and the right to existence of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and Japan had better be thoughtful over the DPRK's warning.

articles.title: U.S. Is to Blame for Growing Tensions on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is to Blame for Growing Tensions on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Trump blustered in the phone dialogue with presidents of other countries that he would take all necessary measures in diplomatic, economic and military fields in order to put an end to the "nuclear threat" from the DPRK.
					 U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson said in a news conference that the U.S. would do its best together with the allied nations to pressurize the DPRK.
					
					 U.S. Secretary of Defense Mattis also ranted that the U.S. would take detailed actions if north Korea launches missiles at south Korea, Japan, Guam and the mainland of the U.S.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Wednesday says that although the Trump group are vying with each other to cry out for pressure on the DPRK, it sounds as nothing but pitiful despair of those upset by the Songun might of Juche Korea.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is misleading public opinion by claiming that the DPRK is to blame for the growing tensions on the peninsula but no one will believe it.
					
					 The U.S. has no qualifications for talking about nuclear threats from other countries as it is a nuclear criminal, who imposed nuclear disaster on mankind for the first time in the world and it is also a poser of nuclear threat to other countries to not its liking after stockpiling nukes.
					
					 As for the reasons for spawning the nuclear issue on the peninsula and the repetition of the vicious cycle of the tensions, they are the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 It is self-evident that the DPRK can never stop bolstering up the nuclear deterrent under the grave situation in which no one can guess when a nuclear war may break out due to the U.S. seeking to stifle the DPRK by nukes.
					
					 The U.S. more persistent moves to launch a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula would precipitate its final doom.

articles.title: Papers Slam S. Korean Chief Executive's "Peace Rhetoric"
articles.content:
Papers Slam S. Korean Chief Executive's "Peace Rhetoric"
 Pyongyang August 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Leading newspapers Wednesday carry articles laying bare the "peace rhetoric" touted by the south Korean chief executive. 
					 The south Korean chief executive let out a spate of "peace rhetoric", besmirching the public opinion, but the situation goes to clearly prove that this is no more than sophism to cover up the criminal scenario to ignite a war against the north in collusion with the U.S., says Rodong Sinmun in an article Wednesday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					  "Peace rhetoric" touted by the south Korean chief executive is the foolish action to put the mask of peace upon his master U.S. bringing the disaster of a nuclear war.
					
					 And this is a chicanery to cover up his sinister intention to do harm to the DPRK by force of arms, backed by his master.
					
					 If he sincerely wants peace, he should take up the cudgel against the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and provocation of nuclear war against the latter, not fault the nuclear deterrent for self-defense of the compatriots which guarantees peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop foolish action to deceive public opinion at home and abroad through the "peace rhetoric," and make the decision to throw off the yoke of a war against the north shouldered by the U.S.
					
					 The prevailing touch-and-go situation on the Korean peninsula requires the south Korean authorities to make a proper policy decision at the crossroads of peace or war. 
					
					 Minju Joson says in a commentary that they should not try to deceive the public opinion at home and abroad with the sugar-coated "peace rhetoric" but make efforts to ward off the U.S. nuclear war, boldly discarding the policy of kowtowing to the U.S.

articles.title: More Crimes of Chun Doo Hwan Fascist Clique Disclosed
articles.content:
More Crimes of Chun Doo Hwan Fascist Clique Disclosed 
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Chun Doo Hwan military fascist clique opened some kinds of gun and artillery fire on participants in the Kwangju Uprising, who had turned out in the struggle for independence against the U.S. and for democracy against fascism in May 1980, according to Kyunghyang Daily News on Aug. 28.
					According to it, the then "martial law enforcement forces" used up to at least 500,000 live shells of 10-odd kinds of weapons such as automatic rifle, revolver and machine gun and anti-tank rocket, nearly 200 grenades and 1,200kg of TNT to crack down on the uprising, killing cruelly more than 5,000 people just in 10 days.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Lauded by Thai Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Lauded by Thai Organization
Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association issued a statement on Aug. 25, the Day of Songun.
					 The statement said:
					
					 August 25 is the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The world people have heard Songun but do not sufficiently understand why the DPRK is giving priority to the military affairs.
					
					 The Korean people were compelled to suffer a war by the U.S. in less than five years after the country's liberation from the Japanese imperialist colonial rule.
					
					 However, they won victory in the war by coming out as one under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the brilliant strategist.
					
					 Through the three-year-long war, the Korean people cherished in mind the value of arms.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il grew up while learning the outstanding commanding art of Kim Il Sung near the table for operational plans at the Supreme Command. He started his Songun revolutionary leadership at the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, 1960.
					
					 The DPRK has worked miracles under the banner of Songun, stunning the world, and has been firmly consolidated as the invincible socialist fortress.
					
					 In those days the Korean people invariably advanced along the road of Songun with the strong courage that if they believe in and follow the Party and the leader, they have nothing to fear.
					
					 Today the DPRK is winning victories only despite the hostile forces' sanctions and pressure.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary exploits of HE Kim Jong Il will shine long with the century.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire by Swiss, Russian Organizations
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire by Swiss, Russian Organizations
Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Swiss and Russian organizations strongly denounced the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in their joint statement on Aug. 22:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists started Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The drills aim at invading the DPRK.
					
					 They are not "annual" and "defensive" rehearsals loudly advertised by the U.S. imperialists but those for the "beheading operation" and "secret operation" aiming at the DPRK's supreme headquarters according to the OPLAN 5015 and those for coping with the latter's ballistic rockets.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should not forget even a moment that the strategic force of the Korean People's Army which makes no empty talk is ready for launching rockets to strike them anytime.
					
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK vehemently denounced the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for conducting their joint military exercises in their statements on Aug. 22 and 24.
					
					 The statements asserted that the U.S. should not forget that its rival is the DPRK which has nuclear weapons, delivery means and the strongest army in the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige el entrenamiento de lanzamiento del cohete "Hwasong-12"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige el entrenamiento de lanzamiento del cohete "Hwasong-12" 
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el entrenamiento de lanzamiento del cohete balistico estrategico de alcance mediano y largo de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.
					  Lo presenciaron Ri Phyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik, Jo Yong Won, Uyu Jin y otros cuadros directivos del Comite Central del PTC, Jang Chang Ha, Jon Il Ho y otros funcionarios del dominio de investigacion de ciencias de defensa nacional.
					
					  En el terreno el Maximo Dirigente fue acogido por el general de ejercito Kim Rak Gyom, comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC, y otros miembros de mando.
					
					  En el ejercicio se movilizaron las unidades artilleras Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas,  que se encargan del deber de atacar las bases de las tropas agresoras yanquis en la zona operacional de Oceano Pacifico, y el chote balistico estrategico de alcance mediano y largo "Hwasong-12".
					
					  Como esta conocido por todo el mundo, este entrenamiento se realizo como un eslabon de manifestacion de las fuerzas armadas frente al ejercicio militar conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian que se efectua por fin pese a nuestra advertencia de significado importante.
					
					  El ejercicio de lanzamiento se realizo en combinacion con la movilidad y ataque inesperados para juzgar e inspeccionar el estado de  reaccion rapida de nuestras fuerzas armadas estrategicas para el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana y confirmar la capacidad de administracion practica del cohete balistico estrategico de alcance mediano y largo, equipado nuevamente.
					
					  Segun la orden del Comandante Supremo, los artilleros Hwasong realzan por primera vez el ejercicio de lanzamiento en la capital de nuestro Estado.
					
					  El Comandante Supremo quien llego a la madrugada al lugar de lanzamiento en la oscuridad, observo los movimientos de manejo del cohete de los artilleros que despliegan con rapidez la plataforma de lanzamiento del cohete "Hwasong-12" y preparan el lanzamiento y elogio sus maniobras exactas.
					
					  El Maximo Dirigente averiguo detalladamente el plan de lanzamiento, la orbita de vuelo fijada, la zona maritima de blanco y otros y dio la orden de disparo.
					
					  Al momento, el "Hwasong.12" subio imponentemente demostrando la dignidad y el poderio de la potencia nuclear del Juche coloriendo de rojo al cielo de Pyongyang.
					
					  El cohete lanzado viajo segun la orbita de vuelo prevista cruzando el cielo de la peninsula Oshima de Hokkaido y el cabo Erimo de Japon y ataco con exactitud la zona maritima de blanco en el mar del Oceano Pacifico del Norte.
					
					  Este ejercicio no dio ninguna influencia a la seguridad de los paises vecinos.
					
					  En el ejercicio fue evaluada la perfeccion de la capacidad de administracion practica del cohete de la unidad artillera Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas y la eficiencia combativa del cohete balistico estrategico de alcance mediano y largo, equipado nuevamente.
					
					  El Comandante Supremo expreso la gran satisfaccion de que se realizo exitosamente el lanzamiento del cohete "Hwasong-12".
					
					  El dijo que los artilleros Hwasong dominaron el sistema del cohete equipado nuevamente y lo manejan bien y prosiguio que a traves de este ejercicio, adquirieran buenas experiencias en la administracion practica del cohete.
					
					  Indico que el presente ejercicio parecido al combate real es el primer paso de la operacion miliar en el Oceano Pacifico realizado por nuestro ejercito y deviene el preludio muy significativo para mantener a raya la isla Guam, base avanzada de la agresion, y subrayo la necesidad de realizar muchos ejercicios de lanzamiento del cohete balistico teniendo como blanco el Oceano Pacifico y acelerar activamente la conversion de las fuerzas armadas estrategicas en las fuerzas combativas, su preparacion para el combate real y su modernizacion.
					
					  Dijo severamente que EE.UU. respondio con los belicosos ejercicios de guerra agresiva a nuestra advertencia de que observara la accion de EE.UU., y afirmo que este entrenamiento realizado por las fuerzas estrategicas es el preludio de la contramedida rotunda contra el simulacro conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian que libran EE.UU. y sus lacayos.
					
					  Esta vez volvio a sacar la leccion de que no debemos tratar caballerosamente con EE.UU. que actua descaradamente despreciando nuestras medidas iniciativas para aliviar la situacion extremada aguda, sino demostrar con la practica, senalo y continuo que como ya aclarado, seguira observando la habla y gesto de EE.UU. y segun eso decidira el acto futuro.
					
					  Expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas estrategicas fortalezcan aun mas la preparacion de batalla de artilleros Hwasong y preparen estrictamente la disposicion de combate capaz de lanzar en cualquier momento los poderosos cohetes balisticos para detener las maniobras militares de los imperialistas yanquis y sus seguidores y garantizar firmemente la seguridad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					  Todos los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC expresaron agradecimiento al Maximo Dirigente, patriota sin igual y heroe de la nacion, quien el 29 de agosto, dia ensangrentado de ser publicada hace 107 anos el infame tratado de anexion de Corea a Japon, practico la operacion valiente para dar el gran temor a los crueles reaccionarios japoneses y permitio en la zona de la capital el lanzamiento el cohete balistico haciendo quitar el rencor acumulado del pueblo coreano. 
					
					  Y juraron que si el CC del PTC da la orden cumpliran con la mision y deber sagrados de sus fidedignas fuerzas armadas nucleares poniendose en el frente del final combate sagrado por acabar con la confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui.

articles.title: Jon Yong Nam se reune con delegacion del Congo Democratico
articles.content:
Jon Yong Nam se reune con delegacion del Congo Democratico
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- El primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud, Jon Yong Nam, converso el dia 30 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de la Federacion de los Estudiantes y Alumnos del Congo Democratico, encabezada por su presidente nacional, Mpongo Ne Kongo, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Efectuada presentacion de ciencias y tecnicas relativas a desarrollo de tren electrico subterraneo
articles.content:
Efectuada presentacion de ciencias y tecnicas relativas a desarrollo de tren electrico subterraneo
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 29 y 30 en el Instituto de Tecnologia Informatica del Ministerio del Ferrocarril la presentacion de ciencias y tecnicas relativas al desarrollo del tren electrico subterraneo a estilo coreano.
					En la cita, efectuada bajo auspicios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea, participaron los profesores, investigadores, tecnicos y cursantes de postgraduado de los sectores de ciencia, educacion y transporte ferroviario, entre otros, la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad de Ferrocarriles de Pyongyang, la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek, el Instituto del Ferrocarril del Ministerio del Ferrocarril y el Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae.
					
					El certamen realizado dividiendose en la seccion de las tecnicas electricas e informaticas y la de mecanica se presentaron los exitos alcanzados en el diseno, fabricacion y manejo de ese tren y mas de 80 disertaciones de alto valor para solucionar los problemas cientifico-tecnicos que surgen en perfeccionarlo mas a base de esos resultados.
					
					Durante la jornada, se impartio la conferencia sobre la ultima tendencia de desarrollo de la carreta grande y el sistema de control de traccion del tren.

articles.title: Efectuada presentacion de ciencias y tecnicas de rama de urbanismo
articles.content:
Efectuada presentacion de ciencias y tecnicas de rama de urbanismo
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 29 y 30 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas la presentacion nacional de ciencias y tecnicas de la rama de urbanismo bajo auspicios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea.
					En la ocasion participaron los cientificos, investigadores, tecnicos y funcionarios de muchas unidades inclusive la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang, el Instituto de Urbanizacion, la Filial de Investigacion de Cesped de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de Corea y la Direccion de Acueductos y Alcantarillados de la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Se presentaron mas de 170 tesis en el certamen efectuado con el objetivo de hacer aporte a registrar nuevos cambios en el urbanismo de este ano.
					
					Se introdujeron las disertaciones que argumentaron profundamente en lo cientifico y teorico los problemas para mejorar la administracion de los edificios y las instalaciones en que se aplico la tecnologia de arquitectura verde.
					
					Ademas, fueron publicados los exitos de investigacion logrados durante el proceso de resolver los problemas cientifico-tecnicos presentados en el urbanismo.

articles.title: Jugadores coreanos logran exitos en la 29a Universiada Mundial de Verano
articles.content:
Jugadores coreanos logran exitos en la 29a Universiada Mundial de Verano
Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los jugadores coreanos registraron el record de la historia en la 29a Universiada Mundial de Verano.
					En la presente cita deportiva, ellos lograron conquistar 23 medallas inclusive 12 de oro batiendo asi el record de 13 medallas (3 medallas de oro, 7 de plata y 3 de bronce) de la Universiada de 2003.
					
					En particular, sacaron las 7 de las 16 medallas de oro (8 para el juego masculino y 8 para el femenino) del levantamiento de pesas, de manera que volvieron a mostrar la superioridad en esa disciplina.
					
					La jugadora Kim Kuk Hyang gano 4 medallas de oro en la plataforma fija (f) de 10 metros del clavado, el clavado simultaneo de la plataforma fija (f) de 10 metros, el clavado simultaneo de plataforma fija de ambos sexos de 10 metros y el juego colectivo femenino. Y el jugador Ri Hyon Ju tambien salio ganador en la plataforma fija (m) de 10 metros de clavado.
					
					La noticia de sucesivas victorias infunde gran alegria al pueblo coreano. 
					
					Ri Yong Hui, madre de Rim Jong Sim y Rim Un Sim quienes conquistaron las medallas de oro en las divisiones de 75kg y 63kg del levantamiento de pesas (f), dijo que se siente muy orgullosa de sus hijas y expreso agradecimiento a la patria que las formo como pesistas competentes. 
					
					Mun Kang Sun, tejedora del taller combinado de tejedura de la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang quien cumplio con antelacion el plan de la economia nacional para 3 anos, senalo que las noticias triunfales estimulan la campana de aumento de produccion, la de creacion y la de ofensiva de las empleadas de la planta. Y expuso su voluntad de frustrar la recrudescente campana de sancion y presion del imperio yanqui y las fuerzas hostiles y estar siempre en la delantera de la gran marcha para el mejoramiento de vida del pueblo.
